DOC.brief_summary: Evaluation of the potential effect that the administration of food or antacid medication may have in the oral absorption of dacomitinib relative to the administration of dacomitinib in absence of food or antacid medication
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Of The Potential Effect That The Administration Of Food Or Antacid Medication May Have In The Oral Absorption Of Dacomitinib (PF-00299804)
DOC.criteria: Healthy subjects including males between the ages of 18 and 55 years. Females of non childbearing potential . Body Mass Index (BMI) of 17.5 to 30.5 kg/m2; and a total body weight >50 kg (110 lbs). An informed consent document signed and dated by the subject. Any condition possibly affecting drug absorption (eg, gastrectomy). A positive urine drug screen. Treatment with an investigational drug within 30 days (or as determined by the local requirement) or the appropriate time based on the elimination characteristics of the study medication.
